Results Logging.Description: Y or N; Y recommended (no logging in preliminary run)

Auto Quiet Mode.Description: Y or N; Y recommended - Automatically continues to Analysis and Reporting if no exceptions found in daily processing (Y/N)

Display Progress Forms.Description: Y or N; Y recommended - Display progress forms during processing (Y/N)

Registration Checks.Description: Y or N; Y recommended for Event Stats checking

Country Codes.Description: blank, ISAF or ISO3; displays countries as codes for reporting

Daily Profile.Description: produce a daily profile, n,hour or session

Wind Data.Description: Use wind data in results processing, Y or N - select N for quick processing

Quick Check Print Errors.Description: print list of errors when detected, Y or N

Birthdays Calculated As At.Description: Event From Date, Event To Date, Current Date

ISWC Qualifying Round %.Description: % of finishing racers required for a qualifing ISWC round

ISWC Qualifying Speed.Description: knots above which a leg is valid

ISWC Round.Description: name of the round in the ISWC Series

ISWC Series.Description: name of series of which this round is a part
